definition[0]: full of liquid, gas, food etc, so that you look or feel much larger than normal
example[1]: I feel really bloated after that meal.
definition[1]: if you describe an organization as bloated, you mean that it is too big and does not work effectively
definition[2]: software that is bloated uses too much of a computerâ€™s memory, and does not work in an efficient way
example[3]: The reviewer thought that the software was too bloated and inelegant.
